scripts.start:debug:local: set -a && . ../../../backend/.env.dist.local && . ../../../backend/.env.override.local && set +a && CROWD_TEMPORAL_TASKQUEUE=snowflakeConnectors SERVICE=snowflake-connectors LOG_LEVEL=trace tsx --inspect=0.0.0.0:9240 src/index.ts
scripts.dev:local: nodemon --watch src --watch ../../libs --ext ts,sql --exec pnpm run start:debug:local
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --watch ../../libs --ext ts,sql --exec pnpm run start:debug
